          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Föld tengelye és pályája</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Earth's axis and orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der die Mittellinie und Bahn Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'axe et l'orbite de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A linha central e órbita da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'asse ed orbita della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο γήινοι άξονας και η τροχιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El eje y órbita de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Föld tengelyének relatív helyzete a forgási ellipszoidhoz képest</string>
            <string language="en-US">The relative position of the Earth in relation to the ellipsoid of rotation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Föld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">bolygó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">tengely</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">keringési pálya</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die relative Position der Masse in Beziehung zu 
dem Ellipsoid der Umdrehung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La position relative de la terre par rapport à 
l'ellipsoïde de la rotation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A posição relativa da terra com relação ao 
ellipsoid da rotação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La posizione relativa della terra rispetto 
all'elissoide di rotazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σχετική θέση της γης σε σχέση με ellipsoid της 
περιστροφής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La posición relativa de la tierra en lo referente
al elipsoide de la rotación</string>
          </description>
